I'd be happy to help with that! If you're in the mood for a stop motion movie, you might enjoy "End of Days" (2015). This animated film tells an intriguing story set at the end of the century when Satan visits New York in search of a bride. A team of unique characters, including Renee Olstead and Rod Steiger, work together to thwart his plans.

Another option could be "The Pink Panther 2" (N/A), featuring the comedic antics of Inspector Jacques Clouseau as he teams up with an international squad of detectives to stop a globe-trotting artifact thief. Starring Steve Martin and Lily Tomlin, this film is sure to bring a smile to your face!
